behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Mm, you're an Unkindled, aren't you.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: I am Sirris, of the Sunless Realms, former servant of the Divinity.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Duties we each bear, but one's duty is a solitary affair.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: I doubt we've much to gain from fraternisation.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: I doubt we've much to gain from fraternisation.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: Hello again.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: I have since heard a great deal about you.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: For one, that you are most gentle of heart.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: I, too, am bound by duty, but can offer you my sign.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: I hear that cordial intrusion lays the path to embers.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: If I can be of help, by all means, do call upon me.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: If you should require assistance, use my sign.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after obtaining the Dreamchaser's Ashes
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text: Thank you for your kind assistance.

behavior: #0After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text: Mm, I have not thanked you, for your generous rescue.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text:
That Dark Spirit was one of Rosaria's Fingers.
Vile bastard offspring who lurk in the darkness.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text: My sworn enemies.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text: Fearsome invaders, to say the least.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text: I would not have made it alone. You have my deepest gratitude.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text:
If you require help on your travels,
I offer you my sign.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her defeat Creighton the Wanderer
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0While helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: I finally found you.

behavior: #0While helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: Just as I promised, grandad, remember?

behavior: #0After helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: Good night, grandad...

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: Oh, there you are.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text:
I'm afraid I've involved you in my affairs,
over a little promise, at that.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: My sincerest thanks for your assistance.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: At last, my grandfather will rest in peace, and I can die.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: But there is...one last thing.

behavior: #0Talk-After helping her against Holy Knight Hodrick
subdialogue_text: May I take a vow? To serve you, as a knight.

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Yes, of course.

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: I am afraid I have overstepped my bounds.

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text:
But if you might ever reconsider,
and allow me to avow myself to you...

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Do not hesitate to speak up.

behavior: #0Choose "Refuse" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Refuse" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Oh, hello again. May I avow myself to you?

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Refuse" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: As a faithful knight, yours and true.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Oh, I am most grateful.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: I, Sirris, do hereby serve as your faithful knight.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text:
Wherever, whenever, I am needed,
and even if all should turn against you...

behavior: #0Choose "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: My loyalty shall never waver.

behavior: #0Choose "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: If I may ever be of assistance, call upon me.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: I am your knight, forever and true.

behavior: #0Talk-After choosing "Accept her knightly vow" to either the 1st or 2nd query
subdialogue_text: Blessing of the moon upon your journey.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked-1st time
#0Upon being attacked-2nd time
#0Upon being attacked & made hostile
subdialogue_text: You've been clean Hollowed, have you?

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile
subdialogue_text: Then I will show no mercy.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile
subdialogue_text: This is not my time to die.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist
subdialogue_text: Wretched Hollow. Your long sleep begins...

behavior: #0Upon dying
subdialogue_text: Forgive me, grandad...

behavior: #0Upon being attacked if the protagonist accepted her knightly vow-1st time
#0Upon being attacked if the protagonist accepted her knightly vow-2nd time
#0Upon being attacked if the protagonist accepted her knightly vow-3rd time
subdialogue_text: What's come over you!

behavior: #0Upon being attacked if the protagonist accepted her knightly vow-4th time
subdialogue_text: Please, stop this!

behavior: #0Upon dying if the protagonist accepted her knightly vow
#0Upon dying if the protagonist accepted her knightly vow
subdialogue_text: My vows...

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after offering a Pale Tongue to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: Mm, I see that you are now a Finger of Rosaria.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after offering a Pale Tongue to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: Your path is wholly different to mine.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after offering a Pale Tongue to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: Gentle Unkindled, I bid you farewell.

behavior: #0Talk-1st time after offering a Pale Tongue to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: If we meet again, it will be as adversaries.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after offering a Pale Tongue to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: Gentle Unkindled, I bid you farewell.

behavior: #0Talk-2nd time after offering a Pale Tongue to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: If we meet again, it will be as adversaries.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: Yes, I see, an arrant Finger you've become.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: Very well.

behavior: #0Upon being attacked & made hostile if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: I will cut each Finger from the hand.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: You poor bastard. May you rest soundly.

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: ##What are you doing?

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: ##Cease this, at once!

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
#0Upon killing the protagonist if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: ##How could this be...

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
subdialogue_text: ##What have I done...

behavior: #0Upon killing the protagonist if a Pale Tongue was offered to Rosaria
